Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
com.fms.Controller.ClientController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/api/v1/client") public class ClientController extends Object
Author:
FMS

Controller rest pour les points d'access des client url localhost:8181/pilotage_contrat/api/v1/client
